column4: Hey I just recently installed ubuntu and it looks like my sound is working, i mean I can move the sound control up and down but I hear no sound. I don't know whats going on :(
Hey I just recently installed ubuntu and it looks like my sound is working, i mean I can move the sound control up and down but I hear no sound. I don't know whats going on :(
are all your channels unmuted in alsamixer?
